title: 392: Teen Pregnancy, Prison, & Church Cults w/ Bethanie Garcia
itunes:title: 392: Teen Pregnancy, Prison, & Church Cults w/ Bethanie Garcia
description:
(TW: assault, abuse, miscarriage) Today The Broads are joined by Bethanie Garcia of “The Garcia Diaries”. She shares about her upbringing in her church, getting pregnant and married at 18, how she began to heal, parenting her 5 children, boundaries, and more. 

 

BETHANIE GARCIA aka THE GARCIA DIARIES:

Follow Bethanie on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thegarciadiaries/ 

TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@thegarciadiaries 

Podcast “The Garcia Diaries Unfiltered”: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-garcia-diaries-unfiltered/id1466466417 

Website: https://thegarciadiaries.com/ 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:
